001
002import java.io.File;
003import java.util.ArrayList;
004import java.util.List;
005
006/**
007 * missing lyrics
008 *
009 * @author matecsaba
010 */
011public class lyrMiss {
012
013    /**
014     * the main
015     *
016     * @param args arguments
017     */
018    public static void main(String[] args) {
019        List<playerSong> need = playerSong.txt2pls(null, playerUtil.readup("need.pls"));
020        List<playerSong> miss = new ArrayList<playerSong>();
021        playerUtil.put("need=" + need.size());
022        for (int i = 0; i < need.size(); i++) {
023            playerSong ntry = need.get(i);
024            if (new File(ntry.lyrFile()).exists()) {
025                continue;
026            }
027            miss.add(ntry);
028        }
029        playerUtil.put("miss=" + miss.size());
030        playerUtil.saveas(playerSong.pls2txt(miss), "miss.pls");
031    }
032
033}
